languages.text: В графине — остатки дешевого амасека, в который для привлекательности явно подлили дезодорирующий состав.
The decanter used to contain a cheap amasec, which, for the sake of attractiveness, has obviously been enriched with a deodorising agent.
languages.original_text: В графине — остатки дешевого амасека, в который для привлекательности явно подлили дезодорирующий состав.

traits.locale_text: The decanter used to contain a cheap amasec, which, for the sake of attractiveness, has obviously been enriched with a deodorizing agent.
The decanter used to contain a cheap amasec, which, for the sake of attractiveness, has obviously been enriched with a deodorizing agent.
The decanter used to contain a cheap amasec, which, for the sake of attractiveness, has obviously been enriched with a deodorising agent.

languages.text: 酒壶里之前装过廉价的艾玛赛克酒。很显然，为了吸引客人，里面又被加了除臭剂。
languages.original_text: The decanter used to contain a cheap amasec, which, for the sake of attractiveness, has obviously been enriched with a deodorising agent.

traits.locale_text: 酒壶里之前装过廉价的艾玛赛克酒。很显然，为了吸引客人，里面又被加了除臭剂。

languages.text: En el decantador antes había un amasec barato, pero, para que fuera más vistoso, ha sido enriquecido con un agente desodorizante.
languages.original_text: The decanter used to contain a cheap amasec, which, for the sake of attractiveness, has obviously been enriched with a deodorising agent.

traits.locale_text: En el decantador antes había un amasec barato, pero, para que fuera más vistoso, ha sido enriquecido con un agente desodorizante.

languages.text: デキャンタの中には安っぽいアマセックが満たされているが、食指をそそらせるための香りづけがされている。
languages.original_text: The decanter used to contain a cheap amasec, which, for the sake of attractiveness, has obviously been enriched with a deodorising agent.

traits.locale_text: デキャンタの中には安っぽいアマセックが満たされているが、食指をそそらせるための香りづけがされている。

languages.text: Die Karaffe enthielt billigen Amasec, der offensichtlich parfümiert wurde, um ihn ansprechender zu machen.
languages.original_text: The decanter used to contain a cheap amasec, which, for the sake of attractiveness, has obviously been enriched with a deodorising agent.

traits.locale_text: Die Karaffe enthielt billigen Amasec, der offensichtlich parfümiert wurde, um ihn ansprechender zu machen.

languages.text: La carafe contenait autrefois un amasec de piètre qualité, bien évidemment agrémenté d'un agent désodorisant pour rendre la boisson plus attractive.
languages.original_text: The decanter used to contain a cheap amasec, which, for the sake of attractiveness, has obviously been enriched with a deodorising agent.

traits.locale_text: La carafe contenait autrefois un amasec de piètre qualité, bien évidemment agrémenté d'un agent désodorisant pour rendre la boisson plus attractive.

languages.text: İçinde eskiden ucuz amasek olduğu belli olan bir karaf. Daha çekici durması adına koku giderici bir madde katıldığı ortada.
languages.original_text: The decanter used to contain a cheap amasec, which, for the sake of attractiveness, has obviously been enriched with a deodorising agent.

traits.locale_text: Eskiden bu karafın içine ucuz bir amasek doldurulmuş ve daha çekici durması için elbette koku giderici bir madde eklenmiş.
